<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sustaining Steel](/Feats.aspx?ID=2874) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 47 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Arcane Cascade](/Actions.aspx?ID=756), [inexorable iron hybrid study](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=1)

**Trigger**
You Cast a Spell using a spell slot.

**Requirements**
You're in Arcane Cascade stance.

</column>

---

You pull magic into your weapon, using its substance to transform the magic into restorative energy. You regain Hit Points equal to double the spell's level and roll to end any [persistent negative damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) you have.

 If the spell was of the [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) school, any persistent negative damage you have ends automatically, and you can change the damage type from Arcane Cascade to positive if you wish. (Positive damage typically damages only [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) or other creatures with [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42).)
name: Sustaining Steel
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, inexorable iron hybrid study
